The final event of the decades imposed by the Leningrad blockade was the " Remembrance Festival " for students of the Bogorod School, which took place on 27 January at the Memorial to the beloved soldiers...

It's a day in the city. President Nikolai Lipatnikov and Mercury journalists visited the Bogorod region
On 27 January 2017, a delegation from the Wyatt Chamber of Commerce and Industry, headed by its President, Nikolai Lipatnikov, and journalists from the Mercure Business Journal, visited the Bogorod region. Chief Editor, Olga Nazarov. Visitors from the magazine were visited by entrepreneurs Sergei Balabanova, Vasilia...
